verbose_text: The expression of iNOS and COX-2 proteins was significantly increased (relative OD values, 1.87 +/- 0.26-fold, p < 0.05 and 7.70 +/- 0.43-fold, p < 0.001, respectively) in LPS exposed Caco-2 cells compared with the negative control (XREF_FIG A-C).
evidence: COX-2 proteins was significantly increased (relative OD values, 1.87 +/- 0.26-fold, p < 0.05 and 7.70 +/- 0.43-fold, p < 0.001, respectively) in LPS
